response.original_title: Blaze and the Monster Machines: Blaze Saves Christmas
response.overview: When Crusher sends Santa's gifts all around Snowball Mountain, Turbo Sled Blaze needs your help to save the holiday! Plus, race to rescuc a little bunny trapped on top of a melting glacier, slide on ice from Crusher's Slippery Ice Machine, and team up with Ninja Blaze to save Crusher and Pickle stuck on an icy mountain!  INCLUDES:  Monster Machine Christmas . Breaking the lce . Catch That Cake! . Ninja Blaze'
response.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines: Blaze Saves Christmas
